text: @BBCNews We haven’t had any rule breakers in our village since after week one. One couple caught it weekend before lockdown.  Everyone now knows everyone and supports each other in the fight against #COVID19 We will be virtually celebrating VE Day on Friday.  #UnitedVillage https://t.co/vgY9L2BgNC
